title: 5 monster stories
brief_description: For children of all ages. This program of stories brings alive actual illustrations from the original books, through animation and ‘iconographic’ techniques. Some of the stories range from a small boy playing with a dinosaur after visiting the museum, to the tale of the serpent Goorialla and his journey across Australia, to a tadpole that is not quite what it seems. Honoured by film festival awards world-wide, these stories are the perfect bridge between video and children’s reading. Titles contained in this volume are: “Danny and the dinosaur”; “Jonah and the great fish”; “The Beast of Monsieur Racine”; “The Rainbow serpent”; “The Mysterious tadpole”.
